## Type of Change

<!-- Check all that apply -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test improvements

## Checklist

<!-- Check all that apply. Remove items that are not relevant -->

- [ ] Tests added/updated for new functionality
- [ ] All tests passing locally (`pnpm -r test`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, API docs, etc.)
- [ ] Changelog entry added (if applicable)
- [ ] No linting errors (`pnpm lint`)
- [ ] No type errors (`pnpm exec tsc --noEmit`)
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Coverage maintained or improved
- [ ] Round-trip tests passing (if applicable)
- [ ] Spec updated (if implementing from `.kiro/specs/`)
